120757.「……君！ たしか 以前\n 依頼を受けてくれた 職人だね。\n 私だ。ユービア:
You! You're the craftsman who took care of the
job for me before, right? I am Teebis, Yubia's
father.

120758.「あのとき ユービアは 私を父親と認めず\n 自分の父は 亡霊になったのだと\n:
At that time, Yubia would not have recognized
me as her father, and would have said some
nonsense about her father being a ghost.

120759.「はじめは 混乱しているのだと思ったが\n 日をおいて 会いにきてみても\n や:
At first I thought she was confused, but when
I came back to see her a few days later, Yubia
still rejected me.

120760.「ユービアが言う 亡霊とは なんのことだ？\n なぜ 息子は 私が死んだと思い込:
What is this ghost Yubia speaks of? Why does
my son think I'm dead? If you know something,
tell me.<yesno><close>

120761.「君も ユービアの様子がおかしかったのは\n 見ただろう。これは ただごとではな:
You saw that Yubia was acting strangely. This
isn't just happening. Please. If you know
something, tell me!<yesno><close>

120762.<pc>は ティービスに\n地底湖の洞くつでの出来事を 説明した。:
<pc> explained to Teebis the events
at Underground Lake Cave.

120763.「な……なんだとっ！？\n ユービアの父親と名乗る 亡霊が\n 地底湖の洞くつに:
What the hell? A ghost claiming to be Yubia's
father is in Underground Lake Cave?

120764.「かわいそうに ユービア……。\n 亡霊に たぶらかされ\n そいつを 父親だと:
Poor Yubia, she must have been bewitched by
the ghost and think he's her father.

120765.「こうしては いられん！\n 私は すぐに宿に戻り 武器を取ってくる。\n 息子:
This can't be! I will return to the inn and
retrieve my weapon. I must destroy the ghost
that is deceiving my son!

120766.「君。いろいろ 世話になったな。\n このことは 息子には 内密に頼むぞ。\n:
You. Thank you for everything you've done for
me. Please don't tell my son about this. Now,
if you'll excuse me, I'm in a hurry!

120767.「ユービアか……どうしたのだね？\n 私の命日は まだ しばらく\n 先のはずだ:
Yubia, what's wrong? The anniversary of my
death is still some time away, isn't it?

120768.「……父さん。\n 今日は 贈り物ではなく……\n 父さんと 話がしたくて 来ま:
Dad. I came here today not to give you a gift,
but to talk to you.

120769.「……ふっ。うれしいことを言ってくれる。\n たまには 親子水入らずで\n 語り:
Phew. He says that makes me happy. It would be
nice to have a talk with a parent and child
together once in a while.

120770.「……あの日。この場所で 魔物に襲われたとき\n 父さんは ボクをかばって\n:
That day. When the monster attacked us here,
my father protected me and fell into the
gutter with the monster.

120771.「おそろしさに 気を失ったボクが\n 目覚めたとき……すぐそばに\n 今の姿にな:
When I fainted from the horror and woke up, my
father was right beside me in his present
form.

120772.「そうして 洞くつの外まで\n ボクを守り 連れていってくれた。\n 今でも は:
And so they protected me and took me outside
the cave. I still remember it clearly.

120774.「……けれど 先日\n ボクの父親と名乗る 男の人が\n ボクを 訪ねてきたので:
But the other day, a man claiming to be my
father came to visit me.

120776.「ボクは ウソをついているのだと思い\n その男の人を 追い返しました。\n だ:
I thought he was lying, so I sent him away.
Because my father is here.

120777.「でも その人は 何度もボクに会いに来た。\n 彼の必死な姿を見ているうちに ボ:
But he kept coming back to see me. As I
watched his desperate appearance, I couldn't
understand what was going on.

120778.「お願いします。答えてください 父さん。\n あなたは ボクの父さんですよね？\:
Please. Please answer me, Dad. You're my
father, aren't you? Please tell me you're the
real deal!

120781.「魔物めっ！ 貴様が 私の息子を\n たぶらかしていたのだな！\n ユービアから:
Monster! You have been playing with my son!
Get away from Yubia!

120782.「……ハッハッハ！\n バレてしまっては しかたがない！: Ha ha ha! It can't be helped if they find out!

120783.「そうとも。ワシは お前の父ではない！\n その身体を乗っ取るため\n 父親のフ:
Yes, I am. I am not your father! I pretended
to be your father in order to take over your
body!

120786.「そうだ……あの日と同じ……。\n 父さんが 今みたいに\n ボクをかばって 戦:
Yes, just like that day. Just like that day...
when you were fighting to protect me, just
like you're doing now.

120788.「父さん！ 父さん！！\n ケガは ありませんかっ！？\n ま また……ボクをか:
Dad! Dad! Are you hurt? You're protecting me
again!

120789.「……案ずるな ユービア。\n ほんの かすりキズだ。: Don't worry Yubia, it's just a scratch.

120790.「それよりも……今度こそ\n お前を守りきれて うれしいよ……。:
More than that, I'm glad I was able to protect
you this time.

120791.「父さん……ごめんなさい。\n ボク 何度も ひどいことを。:
Father, I'm sorry. I'm sorry for all the
things I've done.

120792.「……もう そのことはいい。\n さあ ともに 町へ戻ろう。\n 話したいことが:
Let's not talk about that anymore. Come on,
let's go back to town together. We have a lot
to talk about.

120794.「あれ……<pc>。\n キミも 心配してきてくれたんだね。\n でも もう 大:
That's...<pc>. You came to worry
about me too, didn't you? But I'm fine now.

120795.「ボクは 父さんと さいほうギルドに戻る。\n キミも後で 来てくれ。:
I'm going back to the Sewing Guild with my
dad. You can come back later.

120796.「やあ。君には いろいろと世話になったな。\n 感謝しているよ。\n では 我々:
Hello. You've done a lot for me. I appreciate
it. Now, if you'll excuse us.

120797.「……そなたの目は だませなかったようだな。\n もう 誰も キズつける気はない:
I guess your eyes didn't deceive you. I don't
want to hurt anyone anymore. I just want you
to listen to me for a moment.

120798.「そなただけに 真実を 語ろう……。\n 私は……ユービアの父親では ない。:
I will speak the truth only to you. I am not
Yubia's father.

120799.「無念のあまり 亡霊となってから\n 何年 いや何十年が経っただろう。\n ある:
How many years, or perhaps decades, have passed since I became a ghost out of regret? One day, a traveling father and son were
attacked by a monster here.

120800.「息子をかばい ガケ下に落ちた父を求め\n 泣きじゃくるユービアを見たとき……\:
When I saw Yubia sobbing for her father, who had fallen into the gutter, protecting her son, I thought of the little boy I had left
behind back home.

120801.「ユービアのためだと おのれを偽り……\n 私は 自分のさみしさを埋め合わせるた:
I have been deceiving her to make up for my
own loneliness.

120802.「だが 本物の父親が 生きているのなら\n 私の出る幕はない。これで ユービアも:
But if the real father is still alive, it's
not my place. Now Yubia will forget about the
poor ghost.

120803.「私は もとどおり 名も無き亡霊に戻る。\n そなたも 私のことは どうか忘れて:
I will return to my former state as a nameless
ghost. I beg you to forget about me.

163129.「地底湖の洞くつといえば\n 幼いユービアと 私が 魔物に襲われ\n 生き別れに:
Underground Lake Cave is where the young Yubia
and I were attacked by a monster and left
alive.

163130.「幼い息子と 妻が待つ故郷へと 帰る途中\n この洞くつで 魔物に襲われ 命を落:
I am the traveling swordsman who was attacked and killed by a monster in this cave on my way back to my hometown where my young son and
wife were waiting for me.
